original_text: And Jesus stood before the governor: and the governor asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And Jesus said unto him, Thou sayest.
korean_text: 예수께서 총독 앞에 섰으매 총독이 물어 이르되 네가 유대인의 왕이냐 예수께서 대답하시되 네 말이 옳도다 하시고

sentences.original_text: And Jesus stood before the governor:
and the governor asked him, saying,
Art thou the King of the Jews?
